testsuite.name: com.grailsinaction.UserIntegrationSpec

testcase.name: Saving our first user to the database
Updating a saved user changes its properties
Deleting an exisiting user removes it from the database
Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Saving our first user to the database-- --Output from Updating a saved user changes its properties-- --Output from Deleting an exisiting user removes it from the database-- --Output from Saving a user with invalid properties causes an error--
